<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Prismatic Scales](/Feats.aspx?ID=3999) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Nagaji" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=359" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 51</row>

</column>

---

You can cause your scales to glow with scintillating, many-hued colors, protecting you from energy while dazzling foes. Once per day, you can cast [_prismatic armor_](/Spells.aspx?ID=973) as an occult innate spell, except the spell alters the coloration of your scales instead of causing you to be clad in armor. This difference is cosmetic, and the spell has all the same effects as normal.
name: Prismatic Scales
